Tim Jarvis - Lab 3 

Huffman Tree ClearText.txt file Encoded Messages:

Encoded Message: 11101111100010001101101111001000010001111011100101111111101101101000010001111011000101101100111011010111001011111111011011111101000010

Decoded Message: Sally sells seashells by the seashore.

Verify Encoded Message: 11101111100010001101101111001000010001111011100101111111101101101000010001111011000101101100111011010111001011111111011011111101000010

Verify Decoded Message: SALLYSELLSSEASHELLSBYTHESEASHORE

Encoded Message: 

Decoded Message: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers a peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked.

Verify Encoded Message: 

Verify Decoded Message: PETERPIPERPICKEDAPECKOFPICKLEDPEPPERSAPECKOFPICKLEDPEPPERSPETERPIPERPICKED

Encoded Message: 11011111101011111101001111100111100111011010010111111010100010101101111111111000011111101110110001001100

Decoded Message: Houston, the Eagle has landed.

Verify Encoded Message: 11011111101011111101001111100111100111011010010111111010100010101101111111111000011111101110110001001100

Verify Decoded Message: HOUSTONTHEEAGLEHASLANDED

Encoded Message: 1100111101001110111111110011011011111010111100001101110010111111110001111110111111000110101000

Decoded Message: Is that your final answer?

Verify Encoded Message: 1100111101001110111111110011011011111010111100001101110010111111110001111110111111000110101000

Verify Decoded Message: ISTHATYOURFINALANSWER

Encoded Message: 00111101111111100101100111101011011111010111000111001001000101001111100101111110011111001111011011111010111100011011111110000110001011110001010101010001110

Decoded Message: What do you, like to eat on your hamburgers?

Verify Encoded Message: 00111101111111100101100111101011011111010111000111001001000101001111100101111110011111001111011011111010111100011011111110000110001011110001010101010001110

Verify Decoded Message: WHATDOYOULIKETOEATONYOURHAMBURGERS

Encoded Message: 11001011101001001100100111110101001011110011110111100000010110100001111101001110110101110111100111110011001110011110001011010100010110111010111100001011001111010111100111101100101100010

Decoded Message: I need to put some clothes on.  It is very cold outside

Verify Encoded Message: 11001011101001001100100111110101001011110011110111100000010110100001111101001110110101110111100111110011001110011110001011010100010110111010111100001011001111010111100111101100101100010

Verify Decoded Message: INEEDTOPUTSOMECLOTHESONITISVERYCOLDOUTSIDE

Encoded Message: 1100111111100101011111110001100110101101000001111111001010111100110111101010011111101011101101010011001110011111101110110000000101111110011100011111000100011001111100110011111101101

Decoded Message: I ate a big plate of spaghetti and meatball today

Verify Encoded Message: 1100111111100101011111110001100110101101000001111111001010111100110111101010011111101011101101010011001110011111101110110000000101111110011100011111000100011001111100110011111101101

Verify Decoded Message: IATEABIGPLATEOFSPAGHETTIANDMEATBALLTODAY
